TopicTitle: Greetings, Earthlings! Take me to your GPU.

Articles.Content:
I am considering buying KSP, but am worried that my early 2011 MacBook Pro will choke on the graphics. It's got an integrated Intel HD 3000 chip, which System Information says has 512 MB of VRAM and I am running OSX 10.9.2

Can anyone with a similar setup vouch for its performance?
